esp01.sendATCommand|block: 发送AT命令 %cmd 并且等待%sleepTime毫秒
esp01.initUART|block: 设置ESP-01, TX引脚:%TXPin , RX引脚:%RXPin
esp01.sendUDP|block: 发送UDP, UDP主机IP: %PC_UDPServer_IP|UDP主机端口: %PC_UDPServer_Port|目标端口: %destPort
esp01.STA_TCP|block: STA TCP服务器, 路由器: %wifiRouter|密码: %password
esp01.STA_TCPClient|block: STA TCP客户端, 路由器: %wifiRouter|密码: %password
esp01.STA_UDP_MultiConnections|block: STA UDP多连接, 路由器: %wifiRouter|密码: %password
esp01.STA_UDP_AT|block: STA UDP透传, 路由器: %wifiRouter|密码: %password
esp01.STA_AP_TCP_ForCloud|block: STA_AP TCP云端, 路由器: %wssid|密码: %password
esp01.sendHttp|block: 执行HTTP方法： %method|主机: %host|端口: %port|路径: %urlPath|报头headers: %headers|主体body: %body
esp01.sendHttpAndResponse|block: 发送HTTP方法： %method|主机: %host|端口: %port|路径: %urlPath|报头headers: %headers|主体body: %body
